channel.title: Shattered City (Oct/Nov)
channel.description:
![Shattered City Banner|690x172](upload://15foz3KzOGH4azARQZ8jQX4ySK8.jpeg) This is for eight sessions of *Shattered City*. These sessions will run October/November, Wednesday evenings 8PM Eastern. Attendance at all sessions is strongly encouraged but not required. One session drops ins will be tough. General RSVP open 9/16.
*Shattered City* is built on *Legacy: Life Among the Ruins*. You don’t need to know those rules, but familiarity will definitely make things easier. Rules will be taught however. In session one, we’ll choose discuss tone and safety, choose and build Houses, and create characters. This will likely take the entire session.
> *Shattered City* is a roleplaying game about occupation and revolution in a fantasy world ravaged by war. Together you’ll build a city and sketch out its wonders and scars. You’ll take the reins of factions working to bring freedom to this city – or the foreign Guild sent to bring it to heel. You’ll make the heroes of this city: bold warriors, civic leaders, and uncanny mystics. And together you’ll tell the tale of this place’s struggle for freedom. > > As flashpoints threaten to set the city ablaze, as you fight to pull down the occupying forces or work within their systems to earn yourself prosperity, as you work with the others to find moments of beauty and hope, what sort of community will you build? And what mysteries will you uncover along the way?
We will use Zoom for our sessions. I’ll email all players about a week before the first session with the necessary links. Sessions will run up to three hours. We will plan to record, but I will confirm this with the players. [The Gauntlet Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and we will use Lines and Veils and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) for safety tools.
If you sign up and your availability changes, please remember to drop from the site and give me a heads up.
